artist: Etcher: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully; Designer: Jacques Francois Joseph Saly
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
description: full-length profile of a bald, wrinkled man wearing a cap, knickers and an apron, with a sheathed knife at his proper R side; man holds a steaming long-handled pan
portfolio: From "Recuëil de Caricatures Dessinées par J. Saly et Gravées par A.L. De Lalive D.J.," no. 14
title: Nicolas Bremont, Cook at the French Academy in Rome, no. 14, from "Recuëil de Caricatures"
